subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Joe Flacco, who stands about six and a half feet tall, could be the first quarterback from what used to be called Division I-AA to go in the first round of the N.F.L. draft since 1995.
snippet: Joe Flacco, who stands about six and a half feet tall, could be the first quarterback from what used to be called Division I-AA to go in the first round of the N.F.L. draft since 1995.
